root.description: Train a classifier based on labeled geometries and a list of features to consider.

parameter.name: Input Vector Data
parameter.description: Input geometries used for training (note : all geometries from the layer will be used)

parameter.name: Input XML image statistics file
parameter.description: XML file containing mean and variance of each feature.

parameter.name: Output confusion matrix
parameter.description: Output file containing the confusion matrix (.csv format).

parameter.name: Output model
parameter.description: Output file containing the model estimated (.txt format).

parameter.name: Field names for training features.
parameter.description: List of field names in the input vector data to be used as features for training.

parameter.name: Field containing the class id for supervision
parameter.description: Field containing the class id for supervision. Only geometries with this field available will be taken into account.

parameter.name: Layer Index
parameter.description: Index of the layer to use in the input vector file.

parameter.name: Validation Vector Data
parameter.description: Geometries used for validation (must contain the same fields used for training, all geometries from the layer will be used)

parameter.name: Layer Index
parameter.description: Index of the layer to use in the validation vector file.

parameter.name: Classifier to use for the training
parameter.description: Choice of the classifier to use for the training.

parameter.name: Train Method Type
parameter.description: Type of training method for the multilayer perceptron (MLP) neural network.

parameter.name: Number of neurons in each intermediate layer
parameter.description: The number of neurons in each intermediate layer (excluding input and output layers).

parameter.name: Neuron activation function type
parameter.description: Neuron activation function.

parameter.name: Alpha parameter of the activation function
parameter.description: Alpha parameter of the activation function (used only with sigmoid and gaussian functions).

parameter.name: Beta parameter of the activation function
parameter.description: Beta parameter of the activation function (used only with sigmoid and gaussian functions).

parameter.name: Strength of the weight gradient term in the BACKPROP method
parameter.description: Strength of the weight gradient term in the BACKPROP method. The recommended value is about 0.1.

parameter.name: Strength of the momentum term (the difference between weights on the 2 previous iterations)
parameter.description: Strength of the momentum term (the difference between weights on the 2 previous iterations). This parameter provides some inertia to smooth the random fluctuations of the weights. It can vary from 0 (the feature is disabled) to 1 and beyond. The value 0.1 or so is good enough.

parameter.name: Initial value Delta_0 of update-values Delta_{ij} in RPROP method
parameter.description: Initial value Delta_0 of update-values Delta_{ij} in RPROP method (default = 0.1).

parameter.name: Update-values lower limit Delta_{min} in RPROP method
parameter.description: Update-values lower limit Delta_{min} in RPROP method. It must be positive (default = 1e-7).

parameter.name: Termination criteria
parameter.description: Termination criteria.

parameter.name: Epsilon value used in the Termination criteria
parameter.description: Epsilon value used in the Termination criteria.

parameter.name: Maximum number of iterations used in the Termination criteria
parameter.description: Maximum number of iterations used in the Termination criteria.

parameter.name: set user defined seed
parameter.description: Set specific seed. with integer value.
